products.title: iPhone 15 Pro
products.info: Apple flagship with A17 Pro chip, 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, and titanium frame.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S23
products.info: Samsung’s premium smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, 6.1-inch AMOLED display, and 50MP triple camera.

products.title: MacBook Air M2
products.info: Ultra-light Apple laptop powered by the M2 chip, 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display, and 18-hour battery life.

products.title: ASUS ROG Zephyrus
products.info: High-performance gaming laptop with Ryzen 9 processor, RTX 4070 GPU, and 165Hz QHD display.

products.title: Apple AirPods Pro
products.info: Wireless earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Transparency, and up to 6 hours of listening time.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6
products.info: Smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, AMOLED display, and Wear OS integration.
